taskbody.context: From a structural point of view, a book consists of different page types and the pages contain different regions with different structures and content. In particular, the TextRegion can be specified in more detail as a column title, heading, paragraph region, and so on... Within these regions, the individual texts can show typographical features that can also be labelled..The layout and structure analysis should be done in the proposed steps:

step.cmd: Marking of particular regions on a page
